pageTitle: Basta Surf Tamri Reversible Bikini Top | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Bottoms sold separately. Made in the USA. Hand wash. 80% polyamide/20% lycra spandex. Lustrous, embroidered straps add a touch of bohemian flair to a reversible bikini top. A small ribbon cinches the cups, and the back closes with a knot. Contrast lining. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer While on a year-long globetrotting adventure, designer Samantha August noticed a strong respect of the ocean in the people she met. When she returned to NYC, she focused on how to make the ocean a part of her life. The result is Basta Surf swimwear, a chic line inspired by her love of surfing and travel. And Samantha's designs are beautiful in more ways than one: a portion of all sales will be given to Global Water, a charity committed to creating safe water supplies in developing countries. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
